thread.title: Marius Vaida

author: Marius Vaida
title: Marius Vaida
text:
good evening ! I bought 2 tickets for England - Lithuania WC 2018 Qualification match from your site on February 2nd , but i haven't received them yet although it was mentioned that i should receive these tickets by February 7th. I don't know what's the problem with that and i hope you can help me sort this out .
The reference number is 2J7T3U4G4L52
The tracking number is 1Z337YY9D996417074 . Thank you !
PS: I sent this email to you more than a week ago but I received no answer.The money has already been taken from my card..but no sign of these tickets.I will soon call the police ! Sounds like a scam .
